page.title: 01GENERAL SURVEY
page.content: {OMODE6MVDU19,0,4;0;19,1,0;0;M NL. M OUR BLOCK by RICHARD RANCE EDITED by NICHOLAS HARVEY WHERE WE LIVE THE AREA IS VERY FLAT.THE SEA AND COAST IS ONLY TWO MILES AWAY.THERE ARE A LOT OF DYKES BECAUSE DRAINAGE IS A PROBLEM.THERE HAS BEEN SERIOUS FLOODING OVER THE YEARS.THE LAND IS VERY LOW LYING IT IS NEAR THE HUMBER ESTUARY.THE LAND KEEPS RISING.THERE ARE A LOT OF SALTMARSHES BY THE SEA.THE DRAINAGE BOARD IS RESPONSIBLE FOR ALL OF THE DRAINAGE.IN THE OLDEN DAYS IT WAS MARSHY IN WINTER BUT IN SUMMER IT WAS VERY GOOD FOR GRAZING.THERE ARE A LOT OF FIELDS,TREES,HEDGES,BIRDS AND ANIMALS.THERE ARE FLOCKS,HERDS AND OTHER LIVESTOCK THERE IS THREE VILLAGES.THEY ARE NORTH SOMERCOTES,CONISHOLME AND SOUTH SOMERCOTES.*
